contents: 1. fol. 1b-12a: [Persian treatise on the quadrant]. Begins with faṣl dar alqāb-i khuṭūṭ-i rubʻ; dated 1096 H.
2. fol. 13b-31a: Risālat Kashf al-rayb fī al-ʻamal bi-al-jayb.
4. fol. 40b-51a: Mukhtaṣar dar maʻrifat-i asṭurlāb. A Persian treatise on the astrolabe compiled from the works of Naṣīr al-Dīn al-Ṭusī; in 20 bāb.
5. fol. 51b-53b: Ikhtiṣār mā yataʻallaqu bi-abwāb ʻamal al-layl wa-al-nahār bi-al-rubʻ al-mujayyab.
7. fol. 62b-67a: Bu risale amal-ı nücumu beyanindadir rub-i daire. Turkish treatise on the quadrant in 14 faṣl.
8. fol. 67b-77b: Işbu risale rub-i dair vaz edip cüzüsünün tarikindadir. Turkish treatise on the quadrant.
9. fol. 77b-81a: Risālah fī maʻrifat al-ʻamal bi-al-rubʻ al-muqanṭarāt.
10. fol. 81a-82a: [Definitions of astronomical terms]. In Arabic; followed by an extract on the astrolabe in Ottoman Turkish on fol. 82a.
11. fol. 84b-99b: Ahval-ı sahife-yi ceyb. Turkish treatise on the sine quadrant in 21 faṣl.
extent: 136 leaves : paper ; 208 x 126 mm. bound to 209 x 128 mm.

title.@value: [Collection of Arabic, Turkish, and Persian texts on astronomical instruments].
